br.eti.villani.util

Class RelationBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.eti.villani.util.RelationBuilder

  • public class RelationBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    The mulan learners needs a XML file beyond ARFF file to instantiante a multi-label dataset. This class creates these two files in one step.
    Author:
    VILLANI, L. and PRATI, R. C.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RelationBuilder(java.lang.String nameRelation)
      Creates the ARFF file and XML file with the same name.
      RelationBuilder(java.lang.String nameRelation, java.lang.String nameXml)
      Create the ARFF file and XML file with different names.

        public mulan.data.MultiLabelInstances saveRelation()

                                                   mulan.data.InvalidDataFormatException

        Returns:
        The multi-label set created.
        Throws:
